articles.description: Johnathan Stove had a career-best 28 points and Bryce Washington added 18 with 13 rebounds as Louisiana recovered from its only Sun Belt Conference loss by getting past Georgia Southern 102-91 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Louisiana recovers from only league loss, beats Ga. Southern

articles.description: Dachon Burke scored 29 points, Matty McConnell added 23 -- both career highs -- and the pair combined for seven 3-pointers as Robert Morris beat LIU Brooklyn 96-82 on Saturday to snap a four-game slide.
articles.headline: Robert Morris tops LIU Brooklyn 96-82

articles.description: Eugene German scored 28 points, the last coming on a drive with four seconds left in overtime, and Northern Illinois knocked off Mid-American Conference leader Buffalo 90-88 on Saturday.
articles.headline: German scores 28, OT winner as NIU upsets Buffalo 90-88

articles.description: Keita Bates-Diop takes the pass from Jae'Sean Tate and knocks down a 3-pointer for Ohio State.
articles.headline: Bates-Diop drills 3

images.caption: Keita Bates-Diop takes the pass from Jae'Sean Tate and knocks down a 3-pointer for Ohio State.
images.name: Bates-Diop drills 3

articles.description: Ryan Swan scored 17 points and grabbed 10 rebounds and Air Force earned a season split with New Mexico by upsetting the Lobos, 100-92 on Saturday afternoon in a Mountain West Conference battle.
articles.headline: Air Force shoots past New Mexico in 2nd half for 100-92 win

articles.description: Isaiah Bailey turned in a career high 24 points, six boards, seven assists and four steals to help power Bethune-Cookman to an 87-67 win over Maryland-Eastern Shore on Saturday.
articles.headline: Bethune-Cookman runs away from Maryland-Eastern Shore, 87-67
